DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Mechanisms Blood Pressure Reduction Using Meditation Hypertensive African Americans
DOC.detailed_description: Hypertension , also know high blood pressure , one common health problem among adult , particularly African Americans . If leave untreated , lead heart failure , kidney failure , stroke . High blood pressure cause many factor , include stress , diet , diabetes , kidney disease , obesity . Typical treatment include take medication , lose weight , quit smoking . Meditation may also effective way decrease stress level low blood pressure . This study examine effect specific type meditation , Transcendental Meditation ( TM ) , stress blood pressure level . In previous study , TM show positive effect reduce blood pressure level , research need confirm benefit . This study compare effectiveness TM program enhance health education ( EHE ) program reduce stress blood pressure level African Americans high blood pressure . This 4-month study enroll African Americans early stage hypertension . First , participant take part 3 day baseline testing , include medical history review , blood pressure heart rate measurement , echocardiogram obtain image heart , blood urine collection . Over 24-hour period , blood pressure heart rate measure continuously participant wear pedometer keep track distance walk . Participants also complete stress test ; treadmill exercise test ; questionnaires mental health , physical health , lifestyle . After 3-day baseline period , participant attend informational meeting study staff study participant . They randomly assign either TM group EHE group . Participants TM group learn simple meditation technique 6-day period . They expect meditate 20 minute twice day 4 month . Participants attend follow-up meeting meditation instructor every 2 week throughout study , record progress daily diary . Participants EHE program take part 14 event study , include watch educational film , listen guest speaker , participate instructional activity provide health information blood pressure regulation . In addition , participant attend standard health education class every 2 week . These class provide information reduce risk factor related heart disease stroke . Once month , participant attend study visit undergo blood pressure heart rate measurement . At end 4-month study period , participant undergo repeat baseline testing .
